room_title: Escape room "The Conquered Embassy" by The Escape Tulsa in Tulsa
review: We just enjoyed our first escape room experience and chose The Conquered Embassy because it has a low success rate ( 35% ). Our four family members worked like a well oiled machine and escaped in just over 38 minutes. We will definitely be back to try different rooms, this was a blast!

room_title: Escape room "The Conquered Embassy" by The Escape Tulsa in Tulsa
review: We LOVED our experience! The Conquered Embassy was our room of choice. It was hard!! We selected this room because it only has a 35% success rate and we had several experienced escape gamers. Sadly, we overestimated our ability. We loved the challenge and did solve most of the puzzle but not enough to escape. I highly recommend this place. Great staff and reasonable price for the experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Conquered Embassy" by The Escape Tulsa in Tulsa
review: I was skeptical at first, but this was so much fun! Team reindeer escaped the room with 53 seconds to spare. Was a great team building activity! Staff is friendly & the room we were in was very interesting!
